languages.text: "И все же я удивлен, что эта ксенос еще жива. Что же это, Ваша Светлость? Сентиментальность? Месть? Холодный расчет?" {n}Ксавьер обращает к Ирлиэт долгий, многозначительный взгляд.{/n} "Если не покончите с ней сами — дайте знать, когда она вам наскучит. Мои аколиты с радостью познакомятся с ее тайнами".

"Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."
languages.original_text: "И все же я удивлен, что эта ксенос еще жива. Что же это, Ваша Светлость? Сентиментальность? Месть? Холодный расчет?" {n}Ксавьер обращает к Ирлиэт долгий, многозначительный взгляд.{/n} "Если не покончите с ней сами — дайте знать, когда она вам наскучит. Мои аколиты с радостью познакомятся с ее тайнами".

traits.locale_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

"Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

"Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

"Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

languages.text: “不过，我很惊讶，这个异形居然还活着。这是怎么回事，大人？这是多愁善感？是秋后算账？还是出于某种冰冷的谋划？”{n}卡尔卡扎盯着伊莉耶特看了很久，露出了意味深长的目光。{/n}“你并没有亲手了结她。不过，等你什么时候厌倦她的时候，就和我说一声吧。我的侍仆迫不及待想要了解她的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我很惊讶，这个异形居然还活着。这是怎么回事，大人？这是多愁善感？是秋后算账？还是出于某种冰冷的谋划？”{n}卡尔卡扎盯着伊莉耶特看了很久，露出了意味深长的目光。{/n}“你并没有亲手了结她。不过，等你什么时候厌倦她的时候，就和我说一声吧。我的侍仆迫不及待想要了解她的秘密。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, me sorprende que esta xenos siga viva. ¿A qué se debe, mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Sentimentalismo? ¿Venganza? ¿Un frío cálculo?». {n}Calcazar lanza a Yrliet una larga mirada cargada de sentido.{/n} «Si no quiere matarla personalmente, avísenos cuando se canse de ella. Mis acólitos agradecerán la oportunidad de descubrir sus secretos».
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, me sorprende que esta xenos siga viva. ¿A qué se debe, mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Sentimentalismo? ¿Venganza? ¿Un frío cálculo?». {n}Calcazar lanza a Yrliet una larga mirada cargada de sentido.{/n} «Si no quiere matarla personalmente, avísenos cuando se canse de ella. Mis acólitos agradecerán la oportunidad de descubrir sus secretos».

languages.text: 「この異種族がまだ生きていたとは驚きだ。どうされたのだ、陛下？感傷か？復讐か？それとも冷徹な計算の末のものか？」{n}カルカサルはユリエットに眼差しを注ぐ。{/n}「自分の手で彼女に止めを刺さないのなら、飽いた時にはご連絡を。私のアコライトたちは、彼女の秘密をも知りたがるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

traits.locale_text: 「この異種族がまだ生きていたとは驚きだ。どうされたのだ、陛下？感傷か？復讐か？それとも冷徹な計算の末のものか？」{n}カルカサルはユリエットに眼差しを注ぐ。{/n}「自分の手で彼女に止めを刺さないのなら、飽いた時にはご連絡を。私のアコライトたちは、彼女の秘密をも知りたがるだろう」

languages.text: « Cependant, je suis surpris de voir que cette xénos est encore en vie. Quelle en est la raison, Votre Seigneurie ? Est-ce par sensiblerie ? Vengeance ? Calcul ? » {n}demande Calcazar en adresseant à Yrliet un regard lourd de sous-entendus.{/n} « Le jour où vous vous serez {mf|lassé|lassée} d'elle, si vous ne l'achevez pas vous-même, faites-le-moi savoir. Mes acolytes seront plus que ravis de lui arracher tous ses secrets. »
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, je suis surpris de voir que cette xénos est encore en vie. Quelle en est la raison, Votre Seigneurie ? Est-ce par sensiblerie ? Vengeance ? Calcul ? » {n}demande Calcazar en adresseantà Yrliet un regard lourd de sous-entendus.{/n} « Le jour où vous vous serez {mf|lassé|lassée} d'elle, si vous ne l'achevez pas vous-même, faites-le-moi savoir. Mes acolytes seront plus que ravis de lui arracher tous ses secrets. »

languages.text: "Doch ich bin überrascht, dass dieser Xenos noch lebt. Woran liegt das, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Sentimentalität? Rache? Kalte Berechnung?" {n}Calcazar wirft Yrliet einen langen, bedeutsamen Blick zu.{/n} "Wenn Ihr sie nicht selbst tötet, dann gebt mir Bescheid, wenn Ihr ihrer überdrüssig werdet. Meine Akolythen sind gewiss sehr erpicht darauf, ihre Geheimnisse zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Doch ich bin überrascht, dass dieser Xenos noch lebt. Woran liegt das, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Sentimentalität? Rache? Kalte Berechnung?" {n}Calcazar wirft Yrliet einen langen, bedeutsamen Blick zu.{/n} "Wenn Ihr sie nicht selbst tötet, dann gebt mir Bescheid, wenn Ihr ihrer überdrüssig werdet. Meine Akolythen sind gewiss sehr erpicht darauf, ihre Geheimnisse zu ergründen."

languages.text: "Lakin bu zenonun hâlâ yaşıyor olmasına şaşırdım. Sebep nedir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Vicdan mı yaptın? İntikam mı istedin? Yoksa taş kalplilikten mi?" {n}Calcazar, Yrliet'e uzun ve manalı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kellesini kendin almayacaksan onunla işin bitince haber ver. Havarilerim, sırlarını öğrenmek için can atıyor."
languages.original_text: "Yet I am surprised that this xenos is still alive. What is it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Sentimentality? Revenge? Cold calculation?" {n}Calcazar gives Yrliet a long, significant look.{/n} "If you do not finish her off yourself, send word when you have tired of her. My acolytes will be only too eager to learn her secrets."
